#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int first[100005],second[100005];
int main()
{   int a,b,ans,n,i;
    memset(first,0,sizeof first);
    memset(second,0,sizeof second);
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
        first[a]++;
        if(a!=b)
            second[b]++;
    }
    int m=(n+1)/2;
    ans=n+1;
    for(i=0;i<100001;i++)
    {   int x=first[i]+second[i];
        if(x<m)
            continue;
        else
            {ans=min(ans,max(m-first[i],0));}
    }
    if(ans>n)
        printf("Impossible\n");
    else
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    return 0;
}
